title: Pool Party Renekton Sound Bug - Thunk with Skills/AA
body:
{{champion:58}}
Noticed today that playing Renekton  in PP skin will change the AA/Skill sound when attacking minions or champs. (Not tested on wards or neutrals).  I am not sure if this is intentional. Any update whether it is would be nice.

replies.body:
Hey MrCoppedge! 

Thanks for the report! I'll take a look and see if this is intentional, and if not, get the proper sounds hooked up. ^-^

**EDIT:** This is intentional, as hitting different items in the game will give you different SFX, i.e. metals v. turrets.
if this is intentional, a lot of us will never be using this skin again (especially in my case since these bugged sounds also cause massive lag spikes everytime I hit an enemy with an ability)
This is really annoying his abilities sound like balloons popping, this is a bug right?  His abilities never sounded like this vs minions/champions before...
